name: Western Run
description:
Made in 2 days by the NoHo Game Development Club for Mini Jam 88: Rush

WebGL is unfortunately not available for this game as it fails to handle particle systems and shaders

Contributors:

PhysBoom, Yazlo, Chtun, Motik7, JoshKave

A fast-paced western with an infinite mode!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

LMB - Shoot

Shift - Sprint

C - Quick 180

Song credits:

ZitronSound - Wild West (Main Menu)

Twin Musicom - Way Out West (Gameplay)
